channel.title: Compile error (any1?)

item.title: Compile error (any1?)
item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

Ok in my server im adding a thing much like Holyforce except it heals you, so far so good. Heres what the code looks like [code] case 2968:

	 if(myHP <= 99)
	{               
			heal = 99;
                            hitDiff

= -heal;
myHP

+= heal;

updateRequired = true;

hitUpdateRequired = true;

sendMessage(“You are healed to full health.”);

setAnimation(718);
}
else if(myHP >= 99)
{
return true;
}
break;[/code] But when i compile i get this error client.java:23975: cannot find symbol symbol : variable myHP location: class client if(myHP <= 99) ^ client.java:23979: cannot find symbol symbol : variable myHP location: class client myHP += heal; ^ client.java:23985: cannot find symbol symbol : variable myHP location: class client else if(myHP >= 99) ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
